Summary: Very large gold/amber shape with bulbous extentions at each corner
divs: sighting detailsa friend and i were walking near the ut tower on the campus of the university of texas at night in the late fall or early winter of 1979. there were dozens of people walking around as there always are arund there, and suddenly the whole area lit up in a golden\amber glow. everyone was looking up, and above the ut tower, about a hundred feet above was a huge golden triangle with appendages at each corner like half-domed shaped lights but they might not have been lights as the whole object appeared to be lit up as far as i could tell. the object made no noise and moved very slowly, almost hovering above the tower. it was moving from north to south and then sped up heading towards the downtown area and seemed to just shoot out of sight very quickly. the whole timeframe was only about 10 seconds in duration that we got to see it. interstingly enough, the next day on klbj radio in austin, an announcement was made that anyone who had seen an unusual craft need not worry as the government was testing a new vehicle. i would have to estimate the size of the craft as being nearly the length of a football field, and again it moved without any sound. i really doubt it was a military craft. i am happy to say that i recently found a post by someone else who has seen the object on that night. i felt really exstatic at the time but it has bothered me a great deal since then and always been on my mind. if anyone else was in that area at that time and knows anything about it i would be happy to discuss it.
